verbLexeme: 1. To be eager to have sex or sexual intercourse or to be easily sexually aroused. English = (be) sexually excited. Informal English = (be) randy, (be) horny.
2. To experience the moment of greatest pleasure and excitement during sexual activity. English = have an orgasm.
nominalLexeme: 1. An eagerness to have sex or sexual intercourse or the fact of being easily sexually aroused. English = sexual excitement. Informal English = randiness, horniness.
2. The moment of greatest pleasure and excitement during sexual activity. English = orgasm.
